confirm_signout_message: Are you sure you want to sign out?

no_search_result: There is no result that you searched for.
auth_signin_error_generic: Wrong email or password. Please try again later.
auth_signup_password_uppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter!
auth_signup_password_lowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter!

auth_signup_password_min: Password must be 8 characters at least!

category_add_title_max: Category Title must be at most {{max}} characters

link_add_url_min: Link URL must be at least {{min}} characters
link_add_url_max: Link URL must be at most {{max}} characters
auth_signup_error_user_exists: This email is already in use. Please use a different email address.
auth_error_invalid_parameter: Invalid parameters provided. Please check your input.
auth_signup_error_generic: An error occurred during sign-up. Please try again later.
auth_forgot_password_error_code_mismatch: The verification code you provided does not match.
auth_forgot_password_error_code_expired: The verification code you provided has expired.
auth_forgot_password_error_code_exceed: We can't reset your password because you have done more than one password reset. Please try again later.

auth_verification_send_body: A verification link has been sent to your email. Please check your mail.
